actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Credit Billing Act (Public Law 93-495) with respect to the use of cash discounts.

summary.text: Fair Credit Billing Act Amendments - Defines the term "discount" under the Fair Credit Billing Act as meaning a reduction made from the regular price for purposes of the Truth in Lending Act. Prohibits sellers covered by the Fair Credit Billing Act from imposing a surcharge on a credit card holder who elects to use such credit card in lieu of payment by cash or check.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Credit Billing Act (Public Law 93-495) with respect to the use of cash discounts.
